\[

\[

Example 3.6 : å¤‰æ•°å¤‰æ›ã¨åˆ†æ•£

import numpy as np
from scipy.stats import pareto
import polars as pl
import plotly.express as px

np.random.seed(42)

SAMPLESIZE = 20
shape_parameter = 1
x = pareto.rvs(shape_parameter, size=SAMPLESIZE)
x2 = np.random.uniform(0, 1, SAMPLESIZE)

# Compute ratio
relative_freq = np.arange(0, SAMPLESIZE + 1) / SAMPLESIZE
relative_cumulative_pareto = np.insert(np.cumsum(sorted(x)) / np.sum(x), 0, 0)
relative_cumulative_uniform = np.insert(np.cumsum(sorted(x2)) / np.sum(x2), 0, 0)

# create dataframe
df = pl.DataFrame(
    {
        "relative_freq": relative_freq,
        "pareto": relative_cumulative_pareto,
        "uniform": relative_cumulative_uniform,
    }
)


# compute gini
def compute_gini(relative_freq, relative_cumulative):
    a = relative_freq[1:-1] - relative_cumulative[1:-1]
    b = relative_freq[2:] - relative_freq[:-2]
    return np.sum(a * b)


# plot
pareto_gini = compute_gini(relative_freq, relative_cumulative_pareto)
uniform_gini = compute_gini(relative_freq, relative_cumulative_uniform)

    df,
    x="relative_freq",
    y=["pareto", "uniform"],
    color_discrete_sequence=["blue", "red"],
    markers="x",
    title="""pareto gini coefficient: {:.2f}, uniform gini coeffient:  {:.2f}""".format(
        pareto_gini, uniform_gini

)

    scaleanchor="x",
    scaleratio=1,
)
BASE_SIZE = 600

    shapes=[
        dict(
            type="line",

            y0=0,
            y1=1,
            xref="x",
            x0=0,
            x1=1,
            line=dict(color="gray"),
            label=dict(text="å®Œå…¨å¹³ç­‰ç·š", textposition="middle center"),
        )
    ],
)

title: 16Â  ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¿é–¢æ•°
text:
Def: ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¿é–¢æ•° 
å®Ÿæ•° \(a, b\) ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ï¼Œãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¿é–¢æ•° \(\operatorname{B}(a, b)\) ã¯ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«å®šç¾©ã•ã‚Œã‚‹ï¼
\[
\operatorname{B}(a, b) = \int^1_0 x^{a-1}(1-x)^{b-1}\mathrm{d}x
\]
ã¾ãŸï¼Œã‚¬ãƒ³ãƒé–¢æ•°ã‚’ç”¨ã„ã¦ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«è¡¨ã›ã‚‹
\[

\]







Proof: ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¿é–¢æ•°ã¨ã‚¬ãƒ³ãƒé–¢æ•°ã®é–¢ä¿‚





ã‚¬ãƒ³ãƒé–¢æ•°ã®å®šç¾©ã‚’ç”¨ã„ã¦ï¼Œ
\[
\begin{align*}
\operatorname{\Gamma}(a)\operatorname{\Gamma}(b) &= \int^\infty_0 x^{a-1}\exp(-x)\mathrm{d}x \int^\infty_0 y^{b-1}\exp(-y)\mathrm{d}y \\
                   &= \int^\infty_0 \int^\infty_0 x^{a-1}y^{b-1}\exp(-x-y)\mathrm{d}x \mathrm{d}y \\
\end{align*}
\]
ã“ã“ã§, \(x + y = u, x/(x + y) = v\) ã¨ã„ã†å¤‰æ•°å¤‰æ›ã‚’è€ƒãˆã‚‹ï¼ã¤ã¾ã‚Šï¼Œ
\[
\begin{align*}
x = uv, y = u(1-v)
\end{align*}
\]
ã“ã®ã¨ãã®ãƒ¤ã‚³ãƒ“ã‚¢ãƒ³ã¯
\[
\begin{align*}
\vert\operatorname{det} J \vert= u
\end{align*}
\]
å¾“ã£ã¦ï¼Œ
\[
\begin{align*}
\operatorname{\Gamma}(a)\operatorname{\Gamma}(b) &=\int^\infty_0 \int^\infty_0 (uv)^{a-1}[u(1-v)]^{b-1}\exp(-u) u\mathrm{d}x \mathrm{d}y \\
                   &= \int^\infty_0 \int^\infty_0 u^{a+b-1}\exp(-u) v^{a-1}(1-v)^{b-1}\mathrm{d}x \mathrm{d}y \\
                   &= \int^\infty_0 \int^1_0 u^{a+b-1}\exp(-u) v^{a-1}(1-v)^{b-1}\mathrm{d}v \mathrm{d}u \\
                   &= \int^\infty_0 u^{a+b-1}\exp(-u) \mathrm{d}u \int^1_0 v^{a-1}(1-v)^{b-1}\mathrm{d}v \\
                   &= \operatorname{\Gamma}(a+b)\operatorname{B}(a, b)
\end{align*}
\]
ã¤ã¾ã‚Šï¼Œ
\[
\operatorname{B}(a, b) = \frac{\operatorname{\Gamma}(a+b)}{\operatorname{\Gamma}(a)\operatorname{\Gamma}(b)}
\]









Proof: åº§æ¨™å¤‰æ›





ã‚¬ãƒ³ãƒé–¢æ•°ã¯ \(z^2 = x\) ã¨ã„ã†å¤‰æ•°å¤‰æ›ã‚’ç”¨ã„ã‚‹ã¨ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«å¤‰æ›ã§ãã‚‹
\[
\begin{align*}
\operatorname{\Gamma}(a) &= \int^\infty_0 x^{a-1}\exp(-x)\mathrm{d}x \\
          &= \int^\infty_0 z^{2a-2}\exp(-z^2)\frac{\mathrm{d}x}{\mathrm{d}z}\mathrm{d}z \\
          &= 2\int^\infty_0 z^{2a-1}\exp(-z^2)\mathrm{d}z
\end{align*}
\]
ã“ã‚Œã‚’ç”¨ã„ã¦
\[
\begin{align*}
\operatorname{\Gamma}(a)\operatorname{\Gamma}(b) &= 4\int^\infty_0 x^{2a-1}\exp(-x^2)\mathrm{d}x \int^\infty_0 y^{2b-1}\exp(-y^2)\mathrm{d}y \\
                   &= 4\int^\infty_0 \int^\infty_0 x^{2a-1}y^{2b-1}\exp(-(x^2+y^2))\mathrm{d}x \mathrm{d}y
\end{align*}
\]
ã“ã“ã§, \(x = r\cos\theta, y=r\sin\theta\) ã¨ã„ã†å¤‰æ•°å¤‰æ›ã‚’è¡Œã†ï¼ã“ã®ã¨ãã®ãƒ¤ã‚³ãƒ“ã‚¢ãƒ³ã¯
\[

\]
ã‚ˆã£ã¦ï¼Œ \[
\begin{align*}
\operatorname{\Gamma}(a)\operatorname{\Gamma}(b) &= 4\int^\infty_0 \int^\infty_0 x^{2a-1}y^{2b-1}\exp(-(x^2+y^2))\mathrm{d}x \mathrm{d}y\\
                   &= 4\int^{\pi/2}_0 \int^\infty_0 r^{2a+2b-2} \cos^{2a-1}\theta \sin^{2b-1}\theta \exp(-r^2) r \mathrm{d}r \mathrm{d}\theta\\
                   &= \left(2\int^{\pi/2}_0 \cos^{2a-1}\theta \sin^{2b-1}\theta \mathrm{d}\theta\right) \times \left(\int^\infty_0r^{2(a+b)-1}\exp(-r^2)\mathrm{d}r \right)\\

\[

\]





Theorem 16.1 ä¸‰è§’é–¢æ•°ã¨ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¿é–¢æ•°ã®é–¢ä¿‚ 
æ­£ã®å®Ÿæ•° \(a, b\) ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ï¼Œä»¥ä¸‹ãŒæˆç«‹ã™ã‚‹
\[

Proof





ãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚¿é–¢æ•°ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ \(x = \cos^2\theta\) ã‚’ç”¨ã„ãŸç½®æ›ç©åˆ†ã§ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«ç¤ºã™ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ï¼
\[

                       &= 2\int^{\pi/2}_0 \cos^{2a-1}\theta \sin^{2b-1}\theta\mathrm{d}\theta

Theorem 16.2 å¼•æ•°ã®äº¤æ›æ€§

ç¶šã„ã¦, \(z\in\mathbb R_{++}\) ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ï¼Œ\(\Gamma(z) = \Gamma(z-1)\cdot (z-1)\) ãŒæˆç«‹ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç¢ºèªã—ã¾ã™ï¼

text:
Def: ã‚¬ãƒ³ãƒé–¢æ•° 
é–¢æ•° \(\Gamma: \mathbb R_{++}\to\mathbb R_{++}\) ã‚’ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«å®šç¾©ã™ã‚‹ï¼š
\[
\Gamma(z) = \int_0^\infty x^{z-1}\exp(-x)\mathrm{d}x
\]
ã“ã‚Œã‚’ã‚¬ãƒ³ãƒé–¢æ•°ã¨å‘¼ã¶ï¼













Theorem 17.1 
\(a > 0\) ã¨ã„ã†å®šæ•°ã‚’ã«ã¤ã„ã¦
\[
\int^\infty_0t^{x-1}\exp(-at)\mathrm{d}t = \frac{\Gamma(x)}{a^x}
\]








Proof





\(u = at\) ã¨ã„ã†å¤‰æ•°å¤‰æ›ã‚’è€ƒãˆã‚‹ï¼\(\frac{\mathrm{d}t}{\mathrm{d}u}=\frac{1}{a}\) ã§ã‚ã‚‹ã®ã§ï¼Œ
\[
\begin{align*}
\int^\infty_0t^{x-1}\exp(-at)\mathrm{d}t
    &= \int^\infty_0\left(\frac{u}{a}\right)^{x-1}\exp(-u)\frac{1}{a}\mathrm{d}u\\
    &= \frac{1}{a^x}\int^\infty_0u^{x-1}\exp(-u)\mathrm{d}u\\
    &= \frac{\Gamma(x)}{a^x}
\end{align*}
\]




Example 17.1 
\[
\int^\infty_{-\infty}x^2\exp(-ax^2)\mathrm{d}x
\]
ã‚‚ä¸Šè¿°ã®å®šç†ã‚’ä½¿ã†ã¨ç°¡å˜ã«è¨ˆç®—ã§ãã¾ã™ï¼\(x^2 = u\) ã¨ã„ã†å¤‰æ•°å¤‰æ›ã‚’å¿µé ­ã«ä»¥ä¸‹ï¼Œ
\[

    &= 2\int^\infty_{0}u\exp(-au)\times \frac{1}{2\sqrt{u}}\mathrm{d} u\\
    &= \int^\infty_{0}u^{\frac{3}{2}-1}\exp(-au)\mathrm{d} u\\
    &= \frac{\Gamma(3/2)}{a^{\frac{3}{2}}}\\

\end{align*}
\]
\[\tag*{\(\blacksquare\)}\]



Theorem 17.2 
ã‚¬ãƒ³ãƒé–¢æ•°ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ï¼Œä»¥ä¸‹ã®ç­‰å¼ãŒæˆã‚Šç«‹ã¤
\[

\]








Proof

\[

\]




ã‚¬ãƒ³ãƒé–¢æ•°ã®æœ‰åãªå…¬å¼


Theorem 17.3 
\[

\]








Proof: ã‚¬ã‚¦ã‚¹ç©åˆ†ã‚’ç”¨ã„ã‚‹å ´åˆ





\(t = u^2\) ã¨ã„ã†å¤‰æ•°å¤‰æ›ã‚’è€ƒãˆã‚‹ï¼
\[
\begin{align*}

    &= \int^\infty_0u^{-1}\exp(-u^2)2u\mathrm{d}u\\[3pt]
    &= 2\int^\infty_0\exp(-u^2)\mathrm{d}u\\[3pt]
    &= \int^\infty_{-\infty}\exp(-u^2)\mathrm{d}u\\[3pt]
    &= \int^\infty_{-\infty}\exp\bigg(-\frac{u^2}{2\times(\frac{1}{\sqrt 2})^2}\bigg)\mathrm{d}u\\[3pt]
    &= \sqrt{2\pi}\frac{1}{\sqrt 2}\\
    &= \sqrt{\pi}
\end{align*}
\]









Proof: æ¥µåº§æ¨™å¤‰æ›ã‚’ç”¨ã„ã‚‹å ´åˆ





\[
\begin{align*}

                                &= \int^\infty_0x^{-1/2}\exp(-x)\mathrm{d}x\int^\infty_0y^{-1/2}\exp(-y)\mathrm{d}y
\end{align*}
\]
ã“ã“ã§ï¼Œ\(x=u^2, y=v^2\) ã¨ç½®æ›ç©åˆ†ã™ã‚‹ï¼
\[
\begin{align*}
\int^\infty_0x^{-1/2}\exp(-x)\mathrm{d}x\int^\infty_0y^{-1/2}\exp(-y)\mathrm{d}y
    &= 4\int^\infty_0\exp(-u^2)\mathrm{d}u\int^\infty_0\exp(-v^2)\mathrm{d}v\\
    &= 4\int^\infty_0\int^\infty_0\exp[-(u^2+v^2)]\mathrm{d}u\mathrm{d}v
\end{align*}
\]
æ›´ã«ï¼Œ\(u = r\cos\theta, v=r\sin\theta\) ã¨ã„ã†æ¥µåº§æ¨™å¤‰æ›ã‚’è¡Œã†ï¼\(u, v\geq 0\) ã§ã‚ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã«ç•™æ„ã™ã‚‹ã¨ï¼Œ\(r\in(0, \infty), \theta\in (0, \pi/2)\) ã«ãªã‚‹ã®ã§
\[

&= 4\times \frac{\pi}{2} \int^{\infty}_0\exp[-r^2]r\mathrm{d}r\\[3pt]
&= 4\times \frac{\pi}{2}\bigg[\frac{\exp(-r^2)}{-2}\bigg]^\infty_0\\[3pt]
&= \pi
\end{align*}
\]

\[

text:

ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚ˆã†ãª \(\exp(x), x^2, \vert x\vert\) ãªã©ãŒå‡¸é–¢æ•°ã®ä¾‹ã§ã™.


Code
